content: वल्गु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वल् संवरणे उ गुक् च <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Lovely, beautiful, handsome, attractive; <ls>R. 5. 68</ls>, <ls>Śi. 5. 29</ls>; <ls>Ki. 18. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Sweet; <ls>Bv. 2. 136.</ls> {@--3@} Precious. {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} Beautifully, splendidly; <ls>Pt. 1. 62.</ls> --ल्गुः A goat.
